longMSG:
You are in hallway 1 on the 1st floor.
 You may go upstairs or
    east to the library through the library door,
    west to the bathroom through the bathroom door, or
    south to the living room through the southern door.
shortMSG:
You are in hallway 1 on the 1st floor.
 You may go...
    up - stairs - hallway2 - 2nd floor 
    east - library door - library - 1st floor
    south - southern door - living room - 1st floor
    west - bathroom door - bathroom - 1st floor
